description: This table contains documentation regarding implant area modifiers.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AREA_OF_IMP_MOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item is used to document additional information about the implantation area for an implant.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes
